com.salimov.yurii.controller.client

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.client.SearchController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/search")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for search for content on the site.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CategoryService, ArticleService, CompanyService, UserService, MainMVFabric, ClientMVFabric

        @RequestMapping(value="/result",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView searchResult(@RequestParam(value="keywords")

                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="content")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String content,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="how_search")
                                                                                                                                 boolean howSearch)
        Returns the page with the found content. Request mapping: /search/result Method: POST
        Parameters:
        keywords - a keywords for content search.
        content - a objects list for content search.
        howSearch - a search mode.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
